welcome:
Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock, Shoot!
   Be the first to win 5 rounds against the computer to win the game.
shoot: Enter your choice: Enter 'r' for rock, 'p' for paper, 'sc' for scissors, 'l' for lizard, 'sp' for spock
invalidShoot: Enter valid choice: Enter 'r' for rock, 'p' for paper, 'sc' for scissors, 'l' for lizard, 'sp' for spock
newGame: Start a new game: Enter 'y' yes, n' for no
invalidNewGame: Enter a valid input: Enter 'y' yes, 'n' for no
